org.graalvm.tools.insight.heap

Class HeapDump.ClassBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.graalvm.tools.insight.heap.HeapDump.ClassBuilder
  • Enclosing class:
    HeapDump

    public final class HeapDump.ClassBuilder
extends Object
    Builds structure of a new class for the HeapDump. 

    HeapDump.Builder builder = HeapDump.newHeapBuilder(new FileOutputStream(hprof));
builder.dumpHeap((heap) -> {
    final HeapDump.ClassInstance classActor = heap.newClass("cartoons.Actor").
        field("name", String.class).
        field("friend", Object.class).
        field("age", int.class).
        dumpClass();
    final HeapDump.ObjectInstance jerry = heap.newInstance(classActor).
        put("name", heap.dumpString("Jerry")).
        putInt("age", 47).
        // field 'friend' remains null
        dumpInstance();
    final HeapDump.ObjectInstance tom = heap.newInstance(classActor).
        put("name", heap.dumpString("Tom")).
        put("friend", jerry).
        putInt("age", 32).
        dumpInstance();
    final HeapDump.ClassInstance classMain = heap.newClass("cartoons.Main").
        field("tom", classActor).
        field("jerry", classActor).
        field("thread", java.lang.com.oracle.truffle.tools.dap.types.Thread.class).
        dumpClass();

    HeapDump.InstanceBuilder mainBuilder = heap.newInstance(classMain);
    final HeapDump.ObjectInstance main = mainBuilder.id();
    mainBuilder.put("tom", tom).put("jerry", jerry);

    HeapDump.ObjectInstance cathingThread = heap.newThread("Catching Jerry").
        addStackFrame(classActor, "tom", "Actor.java", -1, jerry, tom, main).
        addStackFrame(classMain, "main", "Main.java", -1, main).
        dumpThread();

    mainBuilder.put("thread", cathingThread).dumpInstance();
});
    Since:
    21.1
    See Also:
    HeapDump.newClass(java.lang.String)

    • Method Detail

      • field

        public HeapDump.ClassBuilder field(String name,
                                   Class<?> type)
        Adds new field with given name and type to the class definition. Primitive type (like (int.class & co.) fields values are stored directly in the instance dump. Other types are references to other instances in the dump.
        Parameters:
        name - name of the field
        type - the type of the view
        Returns:
        this builder
        Since:
        21.1

      • field

        public HeapDump.ClassBuilder field(String name,
                                   HeapDump.ClassInstance type)
        Adds new field with given name and type to the class definition. Values of such field are to other instances in the dump.
        Parameters:
        name - name of the field
        type - the type of the view
        Returns:
        this builder
        Since:
        21.1

      • dumpClass

        public HeapDump.ClassInstance dumpClass()
                                 throws UncheckedIOException
        Dumps the class definition into the HeapDump.
        Returns:
        class instance to use when building instances
        Throws:
        UncheckedIOException - when an I/O error occurs
        Since:
        21.1
        See Also:
        HeapDump.newInstance(org.graalvm.tools.insight.heap.HeapDump.ClassInstance)
